thread.title: Here's your first Phillies lineup of 2017
thread.title_full: Here's your first Phillies lineup of 2017

author: Jonathan Tannenwald
title: Here's your first Phillies lineup of 2017
text:
Here's your first Phillies lineup of 2017 Updated: February 22, 2017 — 8:56 AM EST 10 Share Matt Gelb STAFF WRITER 
Matt Gelb is the Phillies beat writer for the Inquirer, the Daily News, and Philly.com. A graduate of Central Bucks High School West and Syracuse University, he covered the Phillies from 2010 to 2014 with a one-year tour on the Metro desk between baseball assignments. More by Matt Gelb 
CLEARWATER, Fla. — Pretend baseball is almost here. The Phillies will play the University of Tampa on Thursday at 1 p.m. at Spectrum Field. They will send a majority of their best prospects up against the collegiate team. 
Here is Pete Mackanin's first lineup of the spring: 
1. Roman Quinn CF8. Hector Gomez 3B9. Andrew Pullin DH 
The game will be seven innings long. Mark Leiter Jr., who is in minor-league camp, will start on the mound. The game will be streamed by the University of Tampa here .
